Description:
Job DescriptionDevelops technical solutions to support business needs with custom wireless LAN access points, remote access, and management devices that are managed by Aruba ClearPath controllers.
Responsible for the design, development, and implementation of custom wireless LAN access points and network devices for the enterprise or campus environment.
Manages complex projects that may include data networking, connectivity, WAN optimization, and cloud services.
Leads a technical team to Configure and implement wireless networks.
Design, configure, and maintain the wireless access control system and the wireless LAN controller configuration.
Provides wireless network-related software, hardware, and firmware configuration, integration, and maintenance.
Support network operations teams in identifying and isolating issues that may impact a wireless network.
Provides hardware, software, and firmware to make Aruba the best-performing and most secure solutions available in the market today.Skills
Skills:
Relevant bachelorâ€™s degree or Diploma.
Experience with Aruba Networks is required.
Minimum of 5 years experience in Aruba Networking and/or Systems Engineering
Ability to work effectively with remote employees and suppliers, business partners, customers, and vendors.
Aruba ACSA / ACMP / ACCP
